epfl.sweng.editquestions

Class EditQuestionActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • epfl.sweng.editquestions.EditQuestionActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpcommunicationsAdapter

    public class EditQuestionActivity
extends Activity
implements HttpcommunicationsAdapter
    This activity enables the user to submit new quiz questions.
    Author:
    CanGuzelhan & LorenzoLeon

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)

      • addNewSlot

        public void addNewSlot(View view)
        Whenever the button with the plus sign (+) is clicked, it adds a new possible answer with the hint "Type in the answer" and it is marked as incorrect.

      • submitQuestion

        public void submitQuestion(View view)
        When the user clicks on the button labeled "Submit.", this method first verifies that the quiz question is valid. If the quiz question is valid, then it saves each answer typed in the answer slots and posts it to the SwEng quiz server. After the question is submitted, EditQuestionActivity is brought to the state identical to that when the user freshly started it.
        Parameters:
        view - The view that was clicked.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        When the user clicks on the submission button, this method is triggered to verify all the four requirements defining a valid quiz question : 1) None of the fields of a quiz question may be empty or contain only white spaces. 2) None of the answers of a quiz question may be empty or contain only white spaces. 3) There must be at least 2 answers. 4) One of the answers must be marked as correct.
        Returns:
        True if all requirements defining a valid quiz question are verified, otherwise false.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        After a successful submission of a quiz question, EditQuestionActivity‘s UI is reinitialized.
